com.majeur.preferencekit

Class ExtraButtonsPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • com.majeur.preferencekit.Preference
        • com.majeur.preferencekit.ExtraButtonsPreference

  • public class ExtraButtonsPreference
extends Preference
    Preference that provide extra buttons, it does not provide any persist data feature, it just provide buttons. Can be useful for opening intents or whatever that don't need to persist some data. Buttons clicks can be listened through ExtraButtonsPreference.OnExtraButtonClickListener
